00022   /*                                                                    */
00023   /*                                                                    */
00024   /*                                                                    */
00025   /**********************************************************************/
00026   void ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00027   {
00028     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::SIMCALORIMETERHIT,
00029                                                 _engineName + "_simHitInputCollection",
00030                                                 "Name of SimCalorimeterHit input collections",
00031                                                 _calorimCollection, 
00032                                                 std::string("hcalSD") );
00033 
00034     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter("ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine_caloType",
00035                                                    "ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine prefix to tree variables,e.g. HCAL or TCMT",
00036                                                    _prefix,
00037                                                    std::string("caloType"));
00038 
00039   }
00040   /**********************************************************************/
00041   /*                                                                    */
00042   /*                                                                    */
00043   /*                                                                    */
00044   /**********************************************************************/
00045   void ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00046   {
00047     if ( _prefix.size() > 0 )
00048       if ( _prefix[ _prefix.length()-1 ] != '_' )
00049         _prefix += "_";
00050     
00051     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"nHitsPerEvent").c_str(), &_nHitsPerEvent, string(_prefix+"nHitsPerEvent/I").c_str());
00052 
00053     /* load the pre-generated root dictionary for the vector by executing:*/
00054     gROOT->ProcessLine("#include <vector>");
00055 
00056    //--------------- quantities per cell -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057     _IPtr = new vector<int>;
00058     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"I").c_str(), &_IPtr);
00059     _JPtr = new vector<int>;
00060     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"J").c_str(), &_JPtr);
00061     _KPtr = new vector<int>;
00062     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"K").c_str(), &_KPtr);
00063 
00064     
00065     _xPtr = new vector<float>;
00066     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"x").c_str(), &_xPtr);
00067     _yPtr = new vector<float>;
00068     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"y").c_str(), &_yPtr);
00069     _zPtr = new vector<float>;
00070     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"z").c_str(), &_zPtr);
00071 
00072     _hitEnergyPtr = new vector<float>;
00073     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"hitEnergy").c_str(), &_hitEnergyPtr);
00074     _cellID0Ptr = new vector<int>;
00075     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"cellID0").c_str(), &_cellID0Ptr);
00076 
00077     
00078 
00079    //--------------- quantities per event -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"xCog").c_str(), &_xCog, string(_prefix+"xCog/D").c_str());
00081     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"yCog").c_str(), &_yCog, string(_prefix+"yCog/D").c_str());
00082     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"zCog").c_str(), &_zCog, string(_prefix+"zCog/D").c_str());
00083 
00084         
00085     //--------------- quantities per layer -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"energySumPerEvent").c_str(), &_energySumPerEvent, string(_prefix+"energySumPerEvent/D").c_str());
00087     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"nLayers").c_str(), &_nLayers, string(_prefix+"nLayers/I").c_str());        
00088     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"energySumPerLayer").c_str(), &_energySumPerLayer, string(_prefix+"energySumPerLayer["+_prefix+"nLayers]/D").c_str());
00089     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"nHitsPerLayer").c_str(),&_nHitsPerLayer, string(_prefix+"nHitsPerLayer["+_prefix+"nLayers]/I").c_str());
00090     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"xCogPerLayer").c_str(), &_xCogPerLayer, string(_prefix+"xCogPerLayer["+_prefix+"nLayers]/D").c_str());
00091     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"yCogPerLayer").c_str(), &_yCogPerLayer, string(_prefix+"yCogPerLayer["+_prefix+"nLayers]/D").c_str());
00092     hostTree->Branch(string(_prefix+"zCogPerLayer").c_str(), &_zCogPerLayer, string(_prefix+"zCogPerLayer["+_prefix+"nLayers]/D").c_str());
00093 
00094  
00095 
00096     _histHcalLongProfile = new TH1F("hcalLongProfile", "hcalLongProfile", 38, 0.5, 38.5);
00097   }
00098 
00099 
00100   /**********************************************************************/
00101   /*                                                                    */
00102   /*                                                                    */
00103   /*                                                                    */
00104   /**********************************************************************/
00105   void ASimCalorimeterHitWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00106   {
00107     
00108     int evtNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00109     //if (evtNumber >1) return;
00110     if ((evtNumber % 500) == 0) 
00111       cout<<" \n ---------> Event: "<<evtNumber<<" <-------------\n"<<endl;
00112 
00113     bool calorimCollectionFound = false;
00114 
00115     try {
00116       std::vector< std::string >::const_iterator iter;
00117       const std::vector< std::string >* colNames = evt->getCollectionNames();
00118       
00119       for( iter = colNames->begin() ; iter != colNames->end() ; iter++) {
00120         if ( *iter == _calorimCollection ) calorimCollectionFound = true;
00121       }
00122     }
00123     catch(DataNotAvailableException &e){
00124       std::cout <<  "WARNING: List of collection names not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00125       return;
00126     };
00127 
00128 
00129     //=================================================//
00130     //                                                 //
00131     // Initialize variables                            //
00132     //                                                 //
00133     //=================================================//
00134     _nHitsPerEvent = 0;
00135 
00136     (*_IPtr).clear();
00137     (*_JPtr).clear();
00138     (*_KPtr).clear();
00139 
00140     (*_xPtr).clear();
00141     (*_yPtr).clear();
00142     (*_zPtr).clear();
00143 
00144     (*_hitEnergyPtr).clear();
00145     (*_cellID0Ptr).clear();
00146 
00147     _xCog = 0, _yCog = 0, _zCog = 0;
00148         
00149     float xCogTemp = 0, yCogTemp = 0, zCogTemp = 0;
00150         
00151         
00152     _energySumPerEvent = 0;
00153     _nLayers = _fMaxLayers;
00154         
00155     double xCogPerLayerTemp[_fMaxLayers] = {0.};
00156     double yCogPerLayerTemp[_fMaxLayers] = {0.};
00157     double zCogPerLayerTemp[_fMaxLayers] = {0.};
00158     int nHitsPerLayerTemp[_fMaxLayers]   = {0};
00159 
00160     for (int iLayer = 0; iLayer < _fMaxLayers; iLayer++)
00161       {
00162         _energySumPerLayer[iLayer] = 0.;
00163         _nHitsPerLayer[iLayer]     = 0;
00164         _xCogPerLayer[iLayer]      = 0.;
00165         _yCogPerLayer[iLayer]      = 0.;
00166         _zCogPerLayer[iLayer]      = 0.;
00167       }
00168     
00169         
00170  
00171 
00172     //=================================================//
00173     //                                                 //
00174     // Reading collection of calorimeter hits          //
00175     //                                                 //
00176     //=================================================//
00177     if (calorimCollectionFound){
00178       LCCollection *inputCalorimCollection = evt->getCollection(_calorimCollection);
00179       int noElements = inputCalorimCollection->getNumberOfElements();
00180       
00181       _nHitsPerEvent = noElements;
00182       
00183       CellIDDecoder<SimCalorimeterHit> decoder(inputCalorimCollection);
00184 
00185      
00186       for (int i = 0; i < noElements; i++)
00187         {
00188           SimCalorimeterHit *aCalorimHit = dynamic_cast<SimCalorimeterHit*>(inputCalorimCollection->getElementAt(i));
00189                   
00190           _IPtr->push_back(decoder(aCalorimHit)["I"]);
00191           _JPtr->push_back(decoder(aCalorimHit)["J"]);
00192           int layer = decoder(aCalorimHit)["K"];
00193           _KPtr->push_back(layer);
00194 
00195           const float *hitPos = aCalorimHit->getPosition();
00196           _xPtr->push_back(hitPos[0]);
00197           _yPtr->push_back(hitPos[1]);
00198           _zPtr->push_back(hitPos[2]);
00199           
00200           double energy = aCalorimHit->getEnergy();
00201           _hitEnergyPtr->push_back(energy);
00202           _energySumPerEvent += energy;
00203           
00204           const int cellID0 = aCalorimHit->getCellID0();
00205           _cellID0Ptr->push_back(cellID0);
00206 
00207           xCogTemp += hitPos[0] * energy;
00208           yCogTemp += hitPos[1] * energy;
00209           zCogTemp += hitPos[2] * energy;
00210           
00211           if (layer > 38)
00212             cout<<"layer: "<<layer<<"  energy: "<<energy<<endl;
00213           _energySumPerLayer[layer-1] += energy;
00214           
00215           xCogPerLayerTemp[layer-1] += hitPos[0] * energy;
00216           yCogPerLayerTemp[layer-1] += hitPos[1] * energy;
00217           zCogPerLayerTemp[layer-1] += hitPos[2] * energy;
00218           
00219           nHitsPerLayerTemp[layer-1]++;
00220                   
00221           
00222         }//end loop over SimCalorimeterHits
00223 
00224       //=======================================================================
00225           
00226       if (_energySumPerEvent > 0)
00227         {
00228           _xCog = xCogTemp / _energySumPerEvent;
00229           _yCog = yCogTemp / _energySumPerEvent;
00230           _zCog = zCogTemp / _energySumPerEvent;
00231         }
00232           
00233       for (int iLayer = 0; iLayer < _fMaxLayers; iLayer++)
00234         {
00235           _xCogPerLayer[iLayer] = xCogPerLayerTemp[iLayer] / _energySumPerLayer[iLayer];
00236           _yCogPerLayer[iLayer] = yCogPerLayerTemp[iLayer] / _energySumPerLayer[iLayer];
00237           _zCogPerLayer[iLayer] = zCogPerLayerTemp[iLayer] / _energySumPerLayer[iLayer];
00238                   
00239           _nHitsPerLayer[iLayer] = nHitsPerLayerTemp[iLayer];
00240 
00241           _histHcalLongProfile->Fill(iLayer+1, _energySumPerLayer[iLayer]);
00242  
00243         }
00244       
00245 
00246 
00247     }//end of calorimCollectionFound
00248 
00249  
00250     //======================================================================
00251     //======================================================================
00252     //======================================================================
00253 
00254     
00255   }//end fillVariables()
00256 
00257 }//namespace marlin
